EmailTemplate.name: Work Order is moved to 8.2 On Shelf to ship to client
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Order {!Order.OrderNumber} - 8.2 On Shelf to Ship to Client
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Phunions,
{!Order.OrderNumber} for {!Order.WOAccountLink__c} has been QC'd and is ready to ship to the client. Please coordinate with the client and add any Thank You items to the boxes as needed.
{!Order.WONameLink__c}
Thanks,
Ralph the Rooster
